name: Fate of the World (itch)
description:
In this world, not only are you the hope of the world, you are FUELED by the hope of the population of the Earth. The more hope you give them, the more powerful you get! Strike at the opponents weaknesses to gain hope, and gain more power to defeat your enemies quickly!

Team Swish Swish Dev Team

Dale Albrecht - Artist
Austin Chau - Programmer
James Hage - Designer

Controls:

A-Move Left
D-Move Right
RMB-Melee Slash
LMB-Ranged Slash
WASD - Control Ranged direction
Tap Space-Short Jump
Hold Space-High Jump
Escape-Pause
